Judul: FIELD ���X��� SCREENING, ENGINEERING EVALUATION FOR AND FEASIBILITY STUDY FOR CARBON CAPTURE STORAGE PROJECT
Abstrak:
Industrial sector has already been the most emitter. Indonesia itself is one of the largest world’s ????????2 emitters and
Indonesia already committed itself to the Paris Agreement in the emission reduction mission. Carbon Capture
Storage (CCS) can be considered as one of the solutions to reduce carbon dioxide emission. To conduct this
solution safely and to know technical uncertainty and possibility will be caused by the event, several processes
need to be done, start from the preliminary study (feasibility study) to the pilot-scale project. In this study,
Screening and engineering evaluation are carried out to analyze the feasibility of field “X” for the ????????2
Sequestration project. Several processes will be done in this study, start from literature study, field geological
screening, ????????2 storage capacity estimation, and ????????2 containment analysis. ECLIPSE 2010 simulation is used to
simulate the project. From the result and discussion, Field “X” has been considered as feasible for future carbon
capture sequestration project with an estimated capacity of 182350 MMSCF with good containment for 10 years
of project.
Kata Kunci: Carbon Capture Storage, Screening, Engineering evaluation, Feasibility Study,
